message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product and am interested, but I would like to propose a lower price of $95.
Hi Bob, I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I am willing to consider $105 as my proposed price for the product.

Hi Bob, I'm glad you're still interested in the product. I can see you're willing to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. It's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic product at a fair price!
Hello Alice, I've considered your offer and am willing to agree on a price of $110 for the product.
Hi Bob, I think we're getting close! I'm willing to meet you at $112.50. It's a great compromise, and I'm confident you'll love the product!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I would like to propose a price of $110 for the product.
Hi Bob, it seems like we're stuck at $110. I'm willing to go a bit higher, to $113. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the product.
Hello Alice, I understand your position and am willing to agree on a price of $112.5 for the product.
